title: Dashboard KPI Cards Display Correct Counts
description: Verify that the Dashboard page displays accurate counts for Companies, Users, Assets, and Audit Logs based on the API data.

steps.description: Navigate to the Dashboard page.
Verify KPI cards for Companies, Users, Assets, and Audit Logs are visible.
Verify each KPI card's count matches the mocked backend API response.

title: Dashboard Recent Companies and Assets List Display
description: Check that the Dashboard shows recent companies and assets with correct data fetched from the API.

steps.description: Go to the Dashboard page.
Confirm recent companies list is populated with correct company names and statuses.
Confirm recent assets list is populated with correct asset identifiers and types.

title: Companies Page - List All Companies with Pagination and Status Filter
description: Ensure the Companies page lists all companies with pagination support and allows filtering by status badges.

steps.description: Navigate to the Companies page using the sidebar.
Verify list of companies is visible with name, description, and status badge.
Apply status filter and verify list updates accordingly.
If pagination is present, navigate through pages and verify correct companies are displayed.

title: Companies Page - Create New Company Via Modal
description: Test creating a new company through the modal form opens properly, input fields are focused, and submission creates the company.

steps.description: On Companies page, click the "Add Company" button to open modal.
Verify modal form opens, first input field is focused, and keyboard focus is trapped inside.
Fill in valid company details (name, description, status).
Submit the form.
Verify API call is made with correct data.
Confirm new company appears in the list and modal closes.

title: Company Detail Page - View and Edit Company Details
description: Verify the Company Detail page displays all company information including users and assets, supports editing details, and saving changes updates backend and UI.

steps.description: Navigate to a specific company's detail page.
Verify company details (name, description, status) are displayed correctly.
Verify related users and assets sections are present and populated.
Edit company details (e.g. name, status) in the form.
Save the updated details.
Verify API update call was made and response successful.
Confirm UI reflects updated company details.

title: Users Page - List, Filter, Create and Delete Users
description: Test user listing with filters (status, company), user creation via modal, and user deletion including confirmation dialogs.

steps.description: Go to Users page from sidebar.
Verify list of users shows email, name, status, and primary company.
Apply filtering by status and company and verify filtered results.
Click 'Add User' button to open creation modal.
Confirm modal opens with focus on first input.
Fill in valid user details and submit.
Check API user creation call sent and user appears in list.
Select a user and trigger delete action.
Verify delete confirmation dialog is shown.
Confirm deletion.
Check delete API call is made and user is removed from list.

title: Assets Page - List, Filter, Create, Assign, and Conditional Delete
description: Verify asset listing shows correct details, allows filtering, enables asset creation with company assignment, and enforces conditional deletion rules.

steps.description: Navigate to Assets page.
Verify asset list shows type, identifier, status, and assigned company.
Apply filters and confirm list updates correctly.
Open 'Add Asset' modal form via button.
Confirm modal is focused and accessible.
Fill out asset details including selecting a company and submit.
Verify API call for asset creation is successful and asset appears in list.
Attempt deleting an asset that is assigned to a company.
Confirm deletion is blocked or warning is shown.
Delete an unassigned asset.
Verify asset is deleted and removed from UI.

title: Audit Logs Page - Filter and Pagination Functionality
description: Ensure audit logs are filtered by selected company, entity type, and action with paginated navigation working correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to Audit Logs page.
Verify prompt to select a company if none selected.
Select a company to view audit logs.
Verify audit logs list shows entity type, action, timestamp, and changes.
Apply filters for entity type and action and verify filtered results.
Navigate through pages using pagination controls.
Confirm audit logs update according to pagination.
Open detailed view of an audit log item.
Verify detailed audit log information is displayed correctly.

title: Settings Page - Toggle Theme and Save Preferences
description: Verify user can toggle between light and dark mode themes and settings persist appropriately.

steps.description: Go to the Settings page.
Confirm current theme setting is displayed.
Toggle the theme switch to switch between light and dark mode.
Verify UI theme changes accordingly.
Reload the page.
Confirm selected theme preference is retained.

title: Sidebar Navigation Functionality Across Pages
description: Validate sidebar navigation links route to correct pages and the sidebar remains visible and functional across app pages.

steps.description: Load the application and observe sidebar presence.
Verify sidebar is visible with navigation links to Dashboard, Companies, Users, Assets, Audit Logs, and Settings.
Click each sidebar link one by one.
Confirm navigation to correct page based on link clicked.
Ensure sidebar remains visible and functional after each navigation.

title: Modal Forms Accessibility and Focus Management
description: Test that modal forms open correctly, trap keyboard focus, manage tab order, and close cleanly.

steps.description: Trigger modal form opening for creating/editing an entity.
Verify keyboard focus is set on first input field.
Tab through modal elements to ensure focus is trapped within modal.
Confirm no focus escapes to background page elements.
Close the modal using close button or Escape key.
Verify modal closes and focus returns to triggering element.

title: Visual Regression Testing Across Device Breakpoints
description: Capture visual snapshots of key components and pages across various device viewport sizes and detect UI regressions.

steps.description: Load key pages (Dashboard, Companies, Users, Assets, Audit Logs, Settings).
Capture screenshots at desktop, tablet, and mobile viewport widths.
Compare screenshots against baseline images to identify unexpected UI changes.

title: Accessibility Validation Using axe-core
description: Run automated axe-core accessibility scans on major pages and UI components to ensure zero critical violations per WCAG 2.1 AA.

steps.description: Navigate to pages: Dashboard, Companies, Company Detail, Users, Assets, Audit Logs, Settings.
Run axe-core accessibility scan on each page and major UI components.
Verify no critical accessibility violations are reported.

title: API Failure Handling During Data Fetch
description: Simulate backend API failures to verify the frontend gracefully handles errors and displays appropriate messages.

steps.description: Mock API failure for data fetching on Dashboard or Companies page.
Navigate to affected page.
Verify error message or UI fallback is shown to the user.
Confirm application remains stable and responsive.

title: Audit Log Reflects UI Triggered Create/Update/Delete Actions
description: Verify that all create, update, and delete actions performed via UI correctly generate corresponding audit log entries.

steps.description: Perform entity creation (e.g. create a new company or user) through UI modal form.
Verify audit log entry is created with correct entity type, action, and details.
Edit an existing entityâ€™s details.
Verify audit log entry for update is generated with timestamp and changes.
Delete an entity via UI.
Confirm audit log for delete action exists with correct metadata.

title: Loading and Empty State Visuals for UI Components
description: Test that loading spinners appear appropriately during API calls and EmptyState UI is shown when lists have no data.

steps.description: Simulate slow API response or API returning empty list for Companies, Users, or Assets page.
Verify loading spinner is displayed while fetching data.
When data is empty, confirm EmptyState component or message is shown.

title: Expandable Cards Interaction and Data Update
description: Verify that interactive cards like AssetCard and UserCard expand/collapse and support data updates through API calls with UI refresh.

steps.description: Navigate to page containing AssetCards or UserCards.
Click on card expand control.
Confirm additional detailed information is revealed.
Edit details within expanded card and save changes.
Verify API update call and reflect updated data on card.
Collapse the card.
Confirm card returns to collapsed state.

title: CI/CD Pipeline Test Execution and Stability
description: Validate all automated tests run reliably and complete within defined time limits in CI/CD pipeline triggered on push and pull requests.

steps.description: Push code changes to the repository.
Observe GitHub Actions running the test suites.
Confirm all tests pass successfully in unit, integration, E2E, visual regression, and accessibility stages.
Verify test runtime does not exceed specified limits.
